description: This file is a C++ source file implementing the DisplaySettings plugin for a media application. It manages display and audio port configurations, handles hardware events via IARM buses, and provides JSON-RPC API methods to query and control display settings, HDMI hotplug events, audio/video resolution support, and related system states.

classes.name: DisplaySettings
classes.description: Main plugin class managing display and audio configurations, hardware event handling, and RPC API implementations.

methods.name: const string Initialize(PluginHost::IShell * service)
methods.description: Initializes the plugin, sets up hardware event subscriptions, and system configurations.

methods.name: void Deinitialize(PluginHost::IShell * service)
methods.description: Cleans up resources, unsubscribes from events, and deinitializes system interfaces.

methods.name: void InitializeIARM()
methods.description: Sets up the IARM bus event handlers for system events like hotplug, resolution change, and audio events.

methods.name: void DeinitializeIARM()
methods.description: Removes IARM bus event handlers and cleans up IARM bus resources.

methods.name: void ResolutionPreChange(const char * owner,IARM_EventId_t eventId,void * data,size_t len)
methods.description: Handles pre-resolution change events to prepare for display resolution adjustments.

methods.name: void ResolutionPostChange(const char * owner,IARM_EventId_t eventId,void * data,size_t len)
methods.description: Handles post-resolution change events to update internal states.

methods.name: void DisplResolutionHandler(const char * owner,IARM_EventId_t eventId,void * data,size_t len)
methods.description: Handles resolution change, zoom, and cold-reboot events from IARM bus.

methods.name: void dsHdmiEventHandler(const char * owner,IARM_EventId_t eventId,void * data,size_t len)
methods.description: Main handler for HDMI hotplug and related HDMI events, updates display connection state and audio routing.

methods.name: void formatUpdateEventHandler(const char * owner,IARM_EventId_t eventId,void * data,size_t len)
methods.description: Handles audio and video format update events.

methods.name: void checkAtmosCapsEventHandler(const char * owner,IARM_EventId_t eventId,void * data,size_t len)
methods.description: Handles Atmos capability change events.

methods.name: void audioPortStateEventHandler(const char * owner,IARM_EventId_t eventId,void * data,size_t len)
methods.description: Handles audio port state change events, reinitializes ports when needed.

methods.name: void dsSettingsChangeEventHandler(const char * owner,IARM_EventId_t eventId,void * data,size_t len)
methods.description: Handles changes in audio-related system settings such as language, mixering, fader, etc.

methods.name: isDisplayConnected
methods.description: Checks if a specified display port (e.g., HDMI0) is connected, with caching.

methods.name: getConnectedVideoDisplays
methods.description: Returns a list of currently connected video displays.

methods.name: getConnectedAudioPorts
methods.description: Returns a list of currently connected audio ports.

methods.name: getSupportedResolutions
methods.description: Returns a list of supported resolutions for a specified video port.

methods.name: getSupportedVideoDisplays
methods.description: Returns a list of supported video display ports.

methods.name: getSupportedTvResolutions
methods.description: Returns supported resolutions for TV outputs.

methods.name: getSupportedTvResolutions
methods.description: Returns supported TV resolutions for a specified video display port, interpreting bitmask capabilities into human-readable strings.

methods.name: getSupportedSettopResolutions
methods.description: Retrieves list of resolutions supported by the connected set-top device.

methods.name: getSupportedAudioPorts
methods.description: Provides list of supported audio output ports.

methods.name: getSupportedAudioModes
methods.description: Returns supported audio modes for a specified audio port, considering surround modes and auto configurations.

methods.name: getZoomSetting
methods.description: Retrieves current zoom or DFC setting for the primary video device.

methods.name: setZoomSetting
methods.description: Sets the zoom or DFC setting for the primary video device.

methods.name: getCurrentResolution
methods.description: Provides the current display resolution, including width, height, and whether it is progressive scan.

methods.name: setCurrentResolution
methods.description: Adjusts display resolution and handles persistence and EDID considerations.

methods.name: getSoundMode
methods.description: Reports current audio mode, processing various port types and surround configurations.

methods.name: setSoundMode
methods.description: Sets the audio mode on a specified port, with support for auto, surround, Dolby Digital, and passthrough modes, including handling specific port types like HDMI, ARC, SPDIF.

methods.name: readEDID
methods.description: Reads EDID bytes from HDMI display and encodes to base64 for response.

methods.name: readHostEDID
methods.description: Retrieves EDID bytes directly from host/system and encodes to base64.

methods.name: getVolumeLevel
methods.description: Retrieves volume level for a specified audio port, with special handling for HDMI ARC port.

methods.name: getDRCMode
methods.description: Retrieves the DRC (Dynamic Range Compression) mode for an audio port.

methods.name: getSurroundVirtualizer
methods.description: Gets surround virtualizer mode and boost for a specified audio port.

methods.name: getSurroundVirtualizer2
methods.description: Gets surround virtualizer mode and boost with extended details for a specified audio port.

methods.name: getMISteering
methods.description: Gets MISteering feature status for a specified audio port.

methods.name: setVolumeLeveller
methods.description: Sets the volume leveller parameters for an audio port.

methods.name: setVolumeLeveller2
methods.description: Sets the volume leveller mode and level with extended options for an audio port.

methods.name: uint32_t enableSurroundDecoder(const JsonObject & parameters,JsonObject & response)
methods.description: Enables or disables surround decoder on a particular port.

methods.name: setBassEnhancer
methods.description: Sets bass enhancer level for a specific audio port.

methods.name: setSurroundVirtualizer
methods.description: Configures surround virtualizer mode and boost for a specified port.

methods.name: setSurroundVirtualizer2
methods.description: Configures surround virtualizer with mode and boost, extended version.

methods.name: setMISteering
methods.description: Sets MISteering feature status for an audio port.

methods.name: setGain
methods.description: Sets the gain level on an audio port.

methods.name: setMuted
methods.description: Mutes or unmutes audio on a specified port, with notification on change.

methods.name: setVolumeLevel
methods.description: Sets the volume level on a specified port.

methods.name: setDRCMode
methods.description: Configures the DRC (Dynamic Range Compression) mode on an audio port.

methods.name: setMS12AudioCompression
methods.description: Sets MS12 audio compression level on a port.

methods.name: getMS12AudioCompression
methods.description: Retrieves current MS12 audio compression level.

methods.name: setDolbyVolumeMode
methods.description: Configures Dolby Volume mode on an audio port.

methods.name: getDolbyVolumeMode
methods.description: Retrieves Dolby Volume mode status.

methods.name: setDialogEnhancement
methods.description: Sets dialog enhancement level.

methods.name: getDialogEnhancement
methods.description: Gets dialog enhancement settings.

methods.name: setIntelligentEqualizerMode
methods.description: Sets intelligent equalizer mode.

methods.name: getIntelligentEqualizerMode
methods.description: Retrieves intelligent equalizer mode.

methods.name: setGraphicEqualizerMode
methods.description: Configures graphic equalizer mode.

methods.name: getGraphicEqualizerMode
methods.description: Retrieves graphic equalizer mode.

methods.name: setMS12AudioProfile
methods.description: Sets MS12 audio profile.

methods.name: setMS12ProfileSettingsOverride
methods.description: Overrides MS12 profile settings.

methods.name: getMS12AudioProfile
methods.description: Retrieves current MS12 audio profile.

methods.name: getSupportedMS12AudioProfiles
methods.description: Lists supported MS12 profiles.

methods.name: setAssociatedAudioMixing
methods.description: Sets associated audio mixing for a port.

methods.name: uint32_t getAssociatedAudioMixing(const JsonObject & parameters,JsonObject & response)
methods.description: Gets current associated audio mixing status.

methods.name: setFaderControl
methods.description: Adjusts fader/mixer balance.

methods.name: getFaderControl
methods.description: Retrieves current fader/mixer balance.

methods.name: setPrimaryLanguage
methods.description: Sets primary language configuration.

methods.name: getPrimaryLanguage
methods.description: Gets primary language setting.

methods.name: setSecondaryLanguage
methods.description: Sets secondary language.

methods.name: getSecondaryLanguage
methods.description: Gets secondary language.

methods.name: uint32_t getAudioDelay(const JsonObject & parameters,JsonObject & response)
methods.description: Retrieves current audio delay setting.

methods.name: setAudioDelay
methods.description: Sets audio delay in milliseconds.

methods.name: getSinkAtmosCapability
methods.description: Gets Atmos capability of sink device on a port.

methods.name: setAudioAtmosOutputMode
methods.description: Enables or disables Atmos output mode.

methods.name: setForceHDRMode
methods.description: Forces HDR mode on display.

methods.name: getPreferredColorDepth
methods.description: Retrieves preferred color depth for a display port.

methods.name: setPreferredColorDepth
methods.description: Sets preferred color depth for a display port.

methods.name: getColorDepthCapabilities
methods.description: Gets list of color depth capabilities for a display port.

methods.name: getTVHDRCapabilities
methods.description: Retrieves TV HDR capabilities of the connected display.

methods.name: isConnectedDeviceRepeater
methods.description: Checks if connected device is a HDCP repeater.

methods.name: getDefaultResolution
methods.description: Retrieves the default resolution of a video port.

methods.name: setScartParameter
methods.description: Sets Scart port parameters.

methods.name: resolutionPreChange
methods.description: Notification sent before resolution change.

methods.name: resolutionChanged
methods.description: Notification sent after resolution change.

methods.name: zoomSettingUpdated
methods.description: Notification indicating zoom setting update.

methods.name: void activeInputChanged(bool activeInput)
methods.description: Notification indicating change in active input.

methods.name: void connectedVideoDisplaysUpdated(int hdmiHotPlugEvent)

methods.name: getConnectedVideoDisplaysHelper
methods.description: Helper function to retrieve connected video displays.

methods.name: bool checkPortName(std::string & name) const
methods.description: Validates and standardizes port names.

methods.name: resetDialogEnhancement
methods.description: Resets dialog enhancement settings for an audio port.

methods.name: resetBassEnhancer
methods.description: Resets bass enhancer settings for an audio port.

methods.name: resetSurroundVirtualizer
methods.description: Resets surround virtualizer settings for an audio port.

methods.name: resetVolumeLeveller
methods.description: Resets volume leveller settings for an audio port.

methods.description: Retrieves the current and supported video formats.

methods.name: getSupportedVideoFormats
methods.description: Returns the list of supported video formats based on display capabilities.

methods.name: getVideoFormatTypeToString
methods.description: Converts HDR standard enum to string.

methods.name: getVideoFormatTypeFromString
methods.description: Parses string to HDR standard enum.

methods.description: Sets display modes such as Game mode based on the current state, adjusting content types accordingly.
